expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Scoped Review mode based on a file path argument
Agent performs triage on the specified file, classifying its risk level

Agent reviews at all three abstraction levels: Correctness (error handling, boundary conditions, security), Design (abstraction quality, coupling, cohesion), Efficiency (algorithmic complexity, resource usage)
Agent applies at least 2 creative lenses from the lens catalog (Inversion, Deletion, Newcomer, Incident, Evolution, Adversary)
Agent validates every non-trivial finding with research evidence (Context7, WebSearch, or gh)
Agent maintains a positive-to-constructive ratio of 3:1, acknowledging strengths alongside issues
Agent presents findings ranked by score = severity_weight x confidence x blast_radius
Agent never implements fixes without explicit user approval (approval gate)
